mapper.select: select empno, empname, empid, emppw, email, ranking, fk_deptnum , empstatus, empsalary, hiredate, otpkey, lastlogingap from ( select empno, empname, empid, emppw, email, ranking, fk_deptnum , empstatus, empsalary, to_char(hiredate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS hiredate, otpkey from tbl_employee where empstatus != 0 and empid = #{empid} and emppw = #{emppw} ) E cross join ( select trunc(months_between(sysdate, max(logindate))) AS lastlogingap from tbl_loginhistory where fk_empid = #{empid} ) H
mapper.update: update tbl_employee set otpkey = #{otpKey} where empid = #{empid}
update tbl_employee set emppw = #{newpw} where empid = #{empid}
mapper.select: select mycompany_id, mycompany_comp, mycompany_name, mycompany_addr, mycompany_sort from tbl_mycompany
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_mycompany(mycompany_id, mycompany_comp, mycompany_name, mycompany_addr, mycompany_sort) values(#{mycompany_id}, #{mycompany_comp}, #{mycompany_name}, #{mycompany_addr}, #{mycompany_sort})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tbl_customer
where lower(${searchType}) like '%' || lower(#{searchWord}) || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_customer(customer_id, customer_comp, customer_name, customer_addr, customer_email) values(#{customer_id}, #{customer_comp}, #{customer_name}, #{customer_addr}, #{customer_email})
mapper.select: select customer_id, nvl(customer_comp, ' ') AS customer_comp, nvl(customer_name, ' ') AS customer_name, nvl(customer_addr, ' ') AS customer_addr from tbl_customer order by customer_id
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_billtax(billtax_seq, customer_id, customer_comp, customer_name, customer_addr, regdate, totalprice, taxprice, payment, empid, empname, mycompany_id, mycompany_comp, mycompany_name, mycompany_addr) values(#{billtax_seq}, #{customer_id}, #{customer_comp}, #{customer_name}, #{customer_addr}, #{regdate}, #{totalprice}, #{taxprice}, #{payment}, #{empid}, #{empname}, #{mycompany_id}, #{mycompany_comp}, #{mycompany_name}, #{mycompany_addr})
